module_restrictions: EMBA is not available to exchange students.
visa_info:
Students whose exchange period is one semester (or less than 180 days) will have to apply a Visitor Visa while students whose exchange period is more than 180 days will have to apply for a Resident Visa.
Chinese, Hong Kong and Macau passport holders will need to apply for a Taiwan Entry Permit.
https://www.roc-taiwan.org/sg_en/post/34.html
https://www.boca.gov.tw/cp-166-284-6f5f7-2.html
accommodations_info:
On-campus accommodation is available to exchange students. (4-person room for undergraduate and 2-person room for graduate students) More information can be found here :
http://oga.nthu.edu.tw/web.page/detail/sn/43/lang/en
http://sthousing.web.nthu.edu.tw/bin/home.php?Lang=en
cost_of_living:
The estimated monthly living expenses for National Tsing Hua University are as follows:

Breakdown of Costs:
- Accommodation: NTD $1512- NTD $6640
- Food and transport: NTD $8000
- Others (Entertainment, clothes, etc): NTD $12 000

Monthly Estimate: NTD$20 000 - NTD $23 560

For more information, please refer to:
http://oga.nthu.edu.tw/web.page/detail/sn/21/lang/en (see “Tuition” tab)
